about_the_game:
Desktop Garage Kit

Desktop Garage Kit is an ultra-cute and loveable desktop software. It adopts a cartoon rendering shader similar to Genshin Impact as a tribute to miHoYo, and we've spent a year and a half humbly researching and perfecting it. The software breaks through the barriers between 2D and 3D dimensions, making the desktop characters more delicate and realistic. And it has rich interactive action modules and a brand new massive character update, clothing can be changed, lively and cute. The brand-new physics engine presents a more realistic movement, supports acting cute, coy, cute, and healing, and has more actions, interactions, and mysterious modes for you to unlock. It can always be kept on top of all other windows, always accompanying you, looking forward to your opening.

Unlock Adult Mode

Activation method: Click the currently active character, and input the "Up Up Down Down Left Right Left Right B A" command on the keyboard (repeating the input will activate the card draw mode, unlocking more adult content).

Features

▪ 370+ pieces of underwear can be switched at will, showing 3D figurine charming posture and style.

▪ Employing a modest yet effective 3D cartoon shader, presenting a pleasantly delicate and realistic visual experience for users to enjoy.
▪ Rich figurine model library, constantly updating.
▪ Brand new physics engine, character image, clothing, and hair support physics motion calculation, presenting more realistic movement.
▪ 168+ 3D posture libraries and 48+ 3D action sets included, making the characters more lively and cute.
▪ Mysterious mode button, adding more interesting gameplay.
▪ Particle rendering mode, lighter and shadow special effects presented.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain some sexual content.

detailed_description:
Desktop Garage Kit

Desktop Garage Kit is an ultra-cute and loveable desktop software. It adopts a cartoon rendering shader similar to Genshin Impact as a tribute to miHoYo, and we've spent a year and a half humbly researching and perfecting it. The software breaks through the barriers between 2D and 3D dimensions, making the desktop characters more delicate and realistic. And it has rich interactive action modules and a brand new massive character update, clothing can be changed, lively and cute. The brand-new physics engine presents a more realistic movement, supports acting cute, coy, cute, and healing, and has more actions, interactions, and mysterious modes for you to unlock. It can always be kept on top of all other windows, always accompanying you, looking forward to your opening.

Unlock Adult Mode

Activation method: Click the currently active character, and input the "Up Up Down Down Left Right Left Right B A" command on the keyboard (repeating the input will activate the card draw mode, unlocking more adult content).

Features

▪ 370+ pieces of underwear can be switched at will, showing 3D figurine charming posture and style.

▪ Employing a modest yet effective 3D cartoon shader, presenting a pleasantly delicate and realistic visual experience for users to enjoy.
▪ Rich figurine model library, constantly updating.
▪ Brand new physics engine, character image, clothing, and hair support physics motion calculation, presenting more realistic movement.
▪ 168+ 3D posture libraries and 48+ 3D action sets included, making the characters more lively and cute.
▪ Mysterious mode button, adding more interesting gameplay.
▪ Particle rendering mode, lighter and shadow special effects presented.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 2015 models or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th gen or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (with Aero), 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Desktop Garage Kit is an ultra-cute and loveable desktop software. It utilizes an advanced 3D cartoon shader, inspired by Genshin Impact, making the desktop characters more delicate and realistic, breaking through dimensional barriers.
